articles.title: More transmissible and deadly Delta variant surges in UK, threatens Europe and America - WSWS
articles.description: Public Health England analysis shows that the Delta variant is twice as likely to hospitalise people as the Alpha variant.
articles.content:
The Delta variant of COVID-19 is exploding in the UK, in a surge which will soon overtake the rest of Europe.

articles.title: Soccer-Italy put on a show with win over Turkey in Euro 2020 opener - The Star Online
articles.description: ROME (Reuters) -Italy kicked off the European Championship in emphatic style on Friday as they delivered a commanding performance to sweep past toothless Turkey 3-0 in the Stadio Olimpico and stamp their early authority on Group A.

articles.author: Sky
articles.title: Venus: European Space Agency mission aims to unlock mysteries of 'Earth's twin' - Sky News
articles.description: Venus is the most Earth-like planet in size, composition and distance to our sun - but its surface is about 450C (842F).
